overall.question: Complexity (whether it has enough details to be ready for use)
Clarity of UI (whether the UI design clearly shows the way to navigate around this feature)
Security (whether you would feel safe surfing on our platform)
Ease of interest-sharing (whether you would feel comfortable sharing your interests on our platform and find others with the same interests)
Distinctiveness (whether our platform is differentiated enough from other social media platforms)
Any suggestions on change of functionality?
Any advice on better UI design?
